text: Derek Richard John Cox (1931-2008), was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the shot put, long jump and high jump at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, Canada. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2008 deaths Category:English male shot putters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:English male long jumpers Category:English male high jumpers
title: Derek Cox (athlete)
